lead_paragraph: Taking a tip from Shirley MacLaine, the screenwriter of “Chuck & Buck” and “School of Rock” searched for his past lives, then put them on display.
snippet: Taking a tip from Shirley MacLaine, the screenwriter of “Chuck & Buck” and “School of Rock” searched for his past lives, then put them on display....

headline.main: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
